function.description: Creates an empty folder at the target `path` if no such folder exists, and returns the absolute path to that folder.

parameterDescriptions.parameterDescription: The path at which the folder will be made.

function.longDescription: Any necessary folders will be created in order to create this empty folder. For example "some/longer/pathName" will create the folder "some" and "longer", if these didn't exist yet, in order to make the "pathName" empty folder.
